title: Android Wear
description: This is a smal project to learn about Android Wear OS development. It includes a simple app that displays the time and a button to show a toast message. I plan to add more features and improve the UI in the future.

title: Taximeter
description: This is a simple taximeter I started to work on while working with some fellow friends. It is built with Jetpack Compose and Material 3 Expressive. The app allows users to start, stop and reset the taximeter, as well as to set the rate per kilometer and the initial fare. The app also displays the total fare and the distance traveled.

title: Fight Info Retriever
description: This was my first project in backend /frontend development as a personal project (2014). It is a simple app that retrieves flight information from an API and displays it in a user-friendly way. The app allows users to search for flights by origin and destination, and view details such as departure and arrival times, flight duration, and airline information. It uses the API of Despegar.com and uses the early versions of Ember.js
